param.name: accounttype
param.description: list accounts by account type. Valid account types are 1 (admin), 2 (domain-admin), and 0 (user).

param.name: domainid
param.description: list all accounts in specified domain. If used with the name parameter, retrieves account information for the account with specified name in specified domain.

param.name: iscleanuprequired
param.description: list accounts by cleanuprequred attribute (values are true or false)

param.name: isrecursive
param.description: defaults to false, but if true, lists all accounts from the parent specified by the domain id till leaves.

param.name: state
param.description: list accounts by state. Valid states are enabled, disabled, and locked.

response.name: id
response.description: the id of the account

response.name: accounttype
response.description: account type (admin, domain-admin, user)

response.name: domain
response.description: name of the Domain the account belongs too

response.name: domainid
response.description: id of the Domain the account belongs too

response.name: ipavailable
response.description: the total number of public ip addresses available for this account to acquire

response.name: iplimit
response.description: the total number of public ip addresses this account can acquire

response.name: iptotal
response.description: the total number of public ip addresses allocated for this account

response.name: iscleanuprequired
response.description: true if the account requires cleanup

response.name: name
response.description: the name of the account

response.name: networkdomain
response.description: the network domain

response.name: receivedbytes
response.description: the total number of network traffic bytes received

response.name: sentbytes
response.description: the total number of network traffic bytes sent

response.name: snapshotavailable
response.description: the total number of snapshots available for this account

response.name: snapshotlimit
response.description: the total number of snapshots which can be stored by this account

response.name: snapshottotal
response.description: the total number of snapshots stored by this account

response.name: state
response.description: the state of the account

response.name: templateavailable
response.description: the total number of templates available to be created by this account

response.name: templatelimit
response.description: the total number of templates which can be created by this account

response.name: templatetotal
response.description: the total number of templates which have been created by this account

response.name: vmavailable
response.description: the total number of virtual machines available for this account to acquire

response.name: vmlimit
response.description: the total number of virtual machines that can be deployed by this account

response.name: vmrunning
response.description: the total number of virtual machines running for this account

response.name: vmstopped
response.description: the total number of virtual machines stopped for this account

response.name: vmtotal
response.description: the total number of virtual machines deployed by this account

response.name: volumeavailable
response.description: the total volume available for this account

response.name: volumelimit
response.description: the total volume which can be used by this account

response.name: volumetotal
response.description: the total volume being used by this account
